channel.title: Need help with fixing xlog while in combat
channel.description: I need help with fixing xlog while in combat, but i don't want to make it were if you disconnect you die automatically i want it so you just remain there while in combat even if you xlog.. someone please help i tried many tuts and can't find anymore and my source is delta.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2009, 02:21:34 am[/size][hr]some one help please

I need help with fixing xlog while in combat, but i don’t want to make it were if you disconnect you die automatically i want it so you just remain there while in combat even if you xlog… someone please help i tried many tuts and can’t find anymore and my source is delta.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2009, 02:21:34 am[/size][hr]some one help please
